about_the_game:
About

Deaf Wish has the typical characteristics of an old school japanese Horror RPG with its focus on puzzle solving and dealing with emotional trauma.

You'll play as Lily, a young girl who lost her father at an early age and who's mother became unstable because of it.
The gist of the game is that during day-phases you'll encounter reoccurring problems in Lily's life which you'll then process in her dreams.

Since the game is in its Early Access Stage only 1/3 of the story is currently playable.

Features

  • No real audio during day-phases to emphasize with Lilys condition
  • Slight horror with its focus on story.
  • Bloody and implicit scenes.
  • Physical save points (interaction with a blue teddy to save)
  • Controller Support
  • Puzzle solving
  • Detailed chase mechanic

content_descriptors.notes: This game is presented from the perspective of an abused minor. There will be hints to it via textboxes and interactions. There won't be any sexual graphics.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Additional Notes: Steamdeck compatibility only with Proton. Tested with version 8.0-5

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better. Not supported: macOS Big Sur 11.0 and later.
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50), iOS 8.0, Android 4.4.4*

short_description: Uncover the horrors of Lily's life and help her navigate her feelings to make the best out of the life she didn't ask for.
